title: Rubber N’ Road Makes My New Favorite Bib Shorts. But Is a 3D Printed Chamois Actually Better?
content:
I spent 100 miles each in two bib shorts using the new Elastic Interface 3D printed chamois. Here's what I found.

Read the full article at Rubber N’ Road Makes My New Favorite Bib Shorts. But Is a 3D Printed Chamois Actually Better? on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
